info.prettypipes.fluid_extraction_module:
Pulls fluid from adjacent inventories
Filters and pull rates vary by tier
High tiers prevent over-sending
info.prettypipes.fluid_filter_module:
Restricts flow from pipes into adjacent tanks
Filter amount varies by tier
info.prettypipes.fluid_retrieval_module:
Pulls fluid from other tanks in the network
Filters and pull rates vary by tier
High tiers prevent over-sending
info.ppfluids.fluid_item.usage: Use me on a fluid tank to input my contents into it!
info.ppfluids.whitelist.description: Fluids in filter slots are allowed
info.ppfluids.blacklist.description: Fluids in filter slots are disallowed
